</head> <body> <div id="menu"> <py:for each="module in project.modules"> <ul py:if="module.contains(desc)"> <li class="header" py:content="module.pathname" /> <li py:for="class_ in module.classes" class="${(class_ == desc) and 'active' or ''}"><a href="${class_.details}" style="text-transform: none" py:content="class_.name" /></li> </ul> </py:for> </div> <div id="content" class="api"> <h1 py:content="desc.pathname" /> <p class="docstring" py:content="project.render_description(desc)" /> <h2 py:if="desc.classes">Inner Classes</h2> <py:for each="class_ in desc.classes" py:replace="describe(class_)" /> <h2 py:if="desc.methods">Methods</h2> <py:for each="method in desc.methods" py:replace="describe(method)" /> <h2 py:if="desc.functions">Functions</h2> <py:for each="function in desc.functions" py:replace="describe(function)" /> <h2 py:if="desc.attributes">Attributes</h2> <py:for each="member in desc.attributes" py:replace="describe(member)" /> </div> </body> </html>
